. "I genuinely on an hourly basis want to teach myself that this is what can happen when you're successful is that you start to believe your own hype," he explained. Then you start living in this bubble, which is your world, and you start to believe that that's the only world that exists. Which is why most successful people screw it up for themselves normally within two, three, five, ten years. Because they stop listening.
